description:
Add user names as nodes (without the @). This preset fetches you 10 pages with 100 followers each at maximum.

Each user has a numeric ID as well. In case you want to work with the numeric ID change the parameter "screen_name" to "user_id". You can get the user ID with the preset "Get information about users". Select the result and fetch the data with this preset again.

For more information see the reference: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-followers-list.
name: Get list of followers
